page.title: 03B.P OIL TERMINAL(continued)
page.content: estimated that the depot covers 26 acres . The oldest person working here is aged 56 years . The security is carried out by the workers . In the depot there are rules against cigarettes , matches , lighters , flash cameras , etc . Safety has to be very high . There is no tax to pay while the fuel is being stored . There is also an emergency store of water of 296,000 tonnes . In the chart room there are three computers which store the information. The computers collect the information and it is sent to the master computer in Sussex . One lorry load of fuel is very valuable _worth Â£10,000 . There are several methods of transporting fuel . Here they are :boat , lorries and rail tank cars.
